name: foundry-year-zero-roller
title: YZUR Test System
description: This is a game system for testing the Year Zero Universal Roller, or YZUR, a dice roller which covers all Year Zero Engine dice mechanics. Supported games are: MYZ, FBL, Coriolis, TFTL, Alien RPG, Vaesen and T2K. Read the manual before use!
author: Stefouch
